name: 2-wheels-1-arm
description: A genetic algorithm searching for solutions to move a simple robot

scripts.install: npm run retrieve_socket.io && npm run build_socket.io
scripts.rebuild_algo: cd algorithm && rm -rfv build/* ; node-gyp rebuild
scripts.build_algo_dev: mkdir -p algorithm/build_dev && cd algorithm/build_dev && cmake .. && make VERBOSE=1
scripts.rebuild_algo_dev: rm -rfv algorithm/build_dev/* 2>/dev/null ; mkdir -p algorithm/build_dev && cd algorithm/build_dev && cmake .. && make VERBOSE=1
